- Collaborative mindset and ability to influence without authority

To tailor this, what type of work energizes you most (building new processes, improving existing ones, customer-facing problem solving, or technical delivery)? And what’s one example of a quick win you’ve delivered in your first 60 days somewhere?

If this direction matches what you’re looking for, I’d encourage you to apply—there’s strong opportunity here for someone who wants to grow and take on increasing ownership quickly.
